Function to plot SNP positions

plot_snp_positions.Rd

Function to plot SNP positions

plot_snp_positions(
  df_snp,
  upper_subset = NULL,
  labels_colname = NULL,
  colors = snp_position_colors(nrow(df_snp))
)

Arguments

df_snp

Data frame with columns position, labels_colname

upper_subset

Subset of SNPs to highlight

labels_colname

Column name for SNP labels

colors

Colors for SNP positions

Value

ggplot
